Description: "Used when defining a class that has no __init__ method"
"Suppreses warning when a sub-class fails to call it's parent __init__"
"Suppresses import of a package not listed in setup 'requires' key
"Suppresses access to a protected member of a class (e.g. some_object._cant_touch_this)"
"Suppresses references like imports and methods that cannot be resolved"
"Suppresses unused local variable as well as unused arguments warning"
